mutants.original_line: """Find the correct spelling for a query."""
if query in words_perfect: return query
if query.lower() in words_cap: return words_cap[query.lower()]
if devowel(query.lower()) in words_vow: return words_vow[devowel(query.lower())]
return ''.join('*' if c in 'aeiou' else c for c in word)
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join(('*' if c in 'aeiou' else c for c in word))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join('*' if c in 'aeiou' else c for c in word)
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(('*' if c not in 'aeiou' else c for c in word))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join('*' if c in 'aeiou' else c for c in word)
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(('' if c in 'aeiou' else c for c in word))

mutants.original_line: return ''.join('*' if c in 'aeiou' else c for c in word)
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(('*' if c in '' else c for c in word))
